titleStmt.title: Bishops-gate lamentation for the loss of their late rector Mr. Robert Clark; who died on Munday the 19 of August 1678, and was buried (together with his dear consort, who died soon after) on the 22 of the same month.

notesStmt.note: Verse - "O heaven's! how could I grieve, did I not know ..."
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
